Description: Lower body sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice with top of foot; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with band of dots, in added white with added red centres, between white bands; below, band of lotus buds in white outline with red centres above white lines; in tondo tips of tongue pattern; exterior: six bands.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0542) (phase 2)
